segments.text: I notice the open cupboard doors, framing the boy in this daring act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a clear violation of rules; he shouldn’t be up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, there’s something undeniably charming about his determination to grab those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how the woman is completely missing this spectacle unfolding in her kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to spill, but she’s in her own world, polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s alarming how unaware she is of the potential disaster lurking just behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel my heart racing as I anticipate the moment the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR
